flawed_nl_solution:
She splits her $960 profit in half to get $960 / 2 = $<<960/2=480>>480.
She receives a total donation of $310, so she now has $310 + $480 = $<<310+480=709>>709.
She needed only $610 so she has $709 - $610 = $99 more than she needs.
#### 99

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 790, not 709. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
